Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
Game class that handles the game moves and the way it evolves

    • checkNeedForSwap

      public boolean checkNeedForSwap()
      Checks if it would have any sense to swap the picked tiles
      Returns:
      false when the picked tiles are of the same type or when the player picked just one tile

    • confirmOrderSelectedTiles

      public void confirmOrderSelectedTiles(List<Tile> pickedTiles)
      Checks if the current tiles order is valid. If so it inserts them in the bookshelf+
      Parameters:
      pickedTiles - list of picked tiles
